content: The Poison Chiefs are optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). There are four of them in total, though you only need to kill one Poison Chief to unlock the journal entry for it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Poison_Chiefs.md', within the main section titled 'Poison Chiefs'.
The content is as follows:
The Poison Chiefs are optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). There are four of them in total, though you only need to kill one Poison Chief to unlock the journal entry for it.
